name: Ninja Cat Adventure
description:
CONTROLS: A and D to move, Mouse + Left-click to throw shurikens

Ninja Cat Adventure is a game created in 24 hours at an annual hackathon in 2019. I made the game alongside 3 other contributors. It's really jank, which can be explained by how I'd never used Unity Raycasts before this project, and also by how only one of my teammates had used Unity prior to this hackathon.

All the art assets were made during the hackathon from scratch within the 24 hours by one of my team members.
